basic_information.scholarship_name: Clara Kessler and Paul Walters Endowed Memorial Scholarship

description: This scholarship honors UCO alumna and Eastern Washington University faculty member Clara Kessler, and a former student of hers, Paul Walters. It recognizes an English Education major who intends to teach English. Eligibility Requirements Enrolled in Bachelor of Arts in Education program in English Education Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is English Education   or SIS_Major is English Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is English Education   or SIS_Major is English Education

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
